discussion.p: LWG modified the formattable concept. The new wording contains a small issue: basic_format_context requires two template arguments, but only one is provided.

blockquote.p: -1- Let fmt-iter-for<charT> be an unspecified type that models output_iterator<const charT&> ().

blockquote.pre: […] template<class T, class charT> concept formattable = formattable-with<remove_reference_t<T>, basic_format_context<fmt-iter-for<charT>, charT>>;
